name: Ten
description:
TEN is a brain-tickling board game of tic-tactical-toe.

From the makers of OLO comes TEN, a multi-player board game for iOS. Based on the timeless Tic-Tac-Toe, TEN is a contemporary take on an old classic. Enjoy playing across ten boards, compete online and offline against others or play alone to give those braincells a workout.

Features:
- 1 player
- 2 player
- Turn-based online multi-player
- Invite friends
- Climb up the leaderboard
- Unique generative melodies
- Themes
- Universal
